related_questions.question:
Dimas Do you have favorite novels?    Rino Thave two favorite novels. The llounted House
and The Secret Place
Dimas What kind of novel are they?
Rino The Hounted House is a horror novel, and
The Secret Place is a detective story
Dimas Which one is thicker?
Rino · The Haunted House has 50 pages, but the
Secret Place has 75 pages,
Dimas How much did you buy those novels?
Rino : The Haunted House is Rp. 35.000, and The
Secret Place is Rp. 125.000
Dimas: I like detective story, too. May I borrow yours
sometimes?
Rino Certainly! You may come to my house because
I have more interesting story books to read
26. Who likes detective story?
A Dimas.
C None
B. Rino
D. Dimas and Rino​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Dimas

Penjelasan:

karena di situ Dimas bilang "i like detective story'"

maaf kalau salah ya, semangat belajar nya

Sometimes he is rather naughty at home, but he usually does what he is asked to do.    Peter is interested in sports very much, and at school, he plays football and tennis. He is the best badminton player in our family.
3. Which of the following statement is not true about Peter​

35. If you called me, I would see you. This means    A. I will not see you so you don't call me.
B. You call me and I don't see you.
C. You don't call me so I don't see you
D. I see you but can't reply you.
E. I see you but you don't call me.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

d. I see you but can't reply you.

related_questions.question:
Tuliskan manfaat air yang ditemukan ditempat tempat berikut!    A. Tanah
B. Sumur
C. Laut 
D. Sungai​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Air Tanah berfungsi Memenuhi berbagai keperluan rumah tangga, seperti mandi, memasak, minum, dan mencuci. Irigasi pertanian, pada sawah petani yang letaknya jauh dari sumber air seperti pada sungai umumnya kemudian akan membuat sumur bor untuk mencukupi berbagai kebutuhan air tanaman pertanian.

B. fungsi air sumur

1. Meminimalisir Genangan Air Hujan

2. mengurangi risiko banjir

3. menambah cadangan air tanah

Penjelasan:

maaf cuma segini, selebihnya cari di google ya kak
